com.intel.fightclub.ui.common.unit.formatter

Class DateTimeFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.ui.common.unit.formatter.DateTimeFormatter

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class DateTimeFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Date time formatter. You should always use this class when you need to format date to be displayed in UI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns date in format Tue, Dec 15, 2015.

      Returns date in format Tue, Dec 15, 2015.
